name: Ready? Stroll!!
description:
Head out to the woods for a walk and learn a little about the people you meet in this side-scrolling Greet-'em-up.

A submission to Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022).

Play as Bowlhead, a man with no mouth only capable of communicating by shooting his words out at passers-by, as he goes for a stroll in the woods. But these aren't the woods as you know them, they're full of ghoulies and spooks and such! Why not say "Hi" and learn a little about who they are and where they're from?

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move/navigate encyclopedia.
  • 'X' or 'K' to toggle encylcopedia of people you've met.
  • 'C' or 'J' to greet in overworld or toggle lore in the encyclopedia.

Thank you to my wonderful voice actors!

  • Felix, "Tellinpa"
  • Adriana
  • Chrillë
  • Kieran, "Xyphon"

And to my dad for grabbing some ambient woodland noise out on a walk!
